snippet.title: Out of Sight Gameplay Trailer || DEMO LIVE 🧸
snippet.description:
Our demo for Out of Sight is now LIVE! 🎉

Play Out of Sight at Steam Next Fest!
Take the chance to guide Sophie on her adventures and get a taste of the gameplay! 🧸

Wishlist Out of Sight and play the demo NOW!

Link in bio!

#SteamNextFest #horrorgame #puzzlegame #immersive #steam #indie #new #comingsoon #outofsight #secondpersonperspective #fyp #dev #collab
